physical_appearance:This is a photograph of a view of a valley
 with a mountain in the background in the distance
 behind clouds. In the center of the photograph
 there are a few roofed houses. There are several demarcated pathways amongst the hills. On the right of the photograph
 there is a lone tree in the foreground. The top-left of the photograph is folded. The edges of the photograph are curved. There is no inscription on the photograph.

metadata.physical_appearance: This is a photograph of a view of a valley, with a mountain in the background in the distance, behind clouds. In the center of the photograph, there are a few roofed houses. There are several demarcated pathways amongst the hills. On the right of the photograph, there is a lone tree in the foreground. The top-left of the photograph is folded. The edges of the photograph are curved. There is no inscription on the photograph.
